sn12.37:1.3: Purāṇamidaṁ, bhikkhave, kammaṁ abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ vedaniyaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn12.37:2.1: Tatra kho, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako paṭiccasamuppādaññeva sādhukaṁ yoniso manasi karoti:
sn12.37:2.2: ‘iti imasmiṁ sati idaṁ hoti, imassuppādā idaṁ uppajjati;
sn12.37:2.3: imasmiṁ asati idaṁ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṁ nirujjhati, yadidaṁ—
